original_title: Six injured in three-wheeler and cab collision near Ravana Falls
original_body_lines: At least six people were injured when a three-wheeler and a luxury cab collided on the Ella–Wellawaya main road, in the area above Ravana Falls.
The injured were admitted to the Demodara and Bandarawela hospitals.
According to police, the victims are residents of the Badulla area.
Officers from the Ella Police Station have commenced further investigations into the incident.
